buckaroo3extended_response.response_payment_failure: Your payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or choose another payment method.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_validation_error: A validation error has occurred. Please try again. If this problem persists, please contact the shop owner.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_technical_error: A technical error has occurred. Please try again. If this problem persists, please contact the shop owner.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_payment_rejected: The payment has been rejected, please try again or select a different paymentmethod.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_canceled_by_user: Your payment was unsuccessful, cancelled by consumer.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_canceled_by_merchant: Your payment was unsuccessful, cancelled by the merchant. Please contact the shop owner.
buckaroo3extended_response.response_default: Your payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or choose another payment method.
